2.name: Advanced React and Redux
2.overview: Master complex React apps and Redux state management
2.long_description: Take your React skills to the next level by learning hooks, context API, React Router, Redux and more with example fullstack apps

5.name: Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms
5.overview: Master complex data structures and algorithms in Python
5.long_description: Covers advanced Python implementations of trees, heaps, graphs, dynamic programming, backtracking, recursion, bit manipulation, and more with a focus on performance and optimization techniques.

7.name: Modern C++ Programming Cookbook
7.overview: Practical recipes for mastering modern C++17/20
7.long_description: Learn the latest C++ features like the STL, multithreading, lambdas, and more through 100+ examples. Covers game dev, emulators, computer vision apps, distributed systems, and other complex programs.
